channel.title: calculus on JO Jaeyoung | 조재영
channel.description: Recent content in calculus on JO Jaeyoung | 조재영

item.title: Taylor Series
item.description: Taylor Series of order 5 around 0 The derivatives at 0 of exp(x): [1, 1, 1, 1, 1, …] The derivatives at 0 of sin(x): [0, 1, 0, -1, 1, …] The derivatives at 0 of cos(x): [1, 0, -1, 0, 1, …] sinh(x): [0, 1, 0, 1, 0, …] cosh(x): [1, 0, 1, 0, 1, …]
